vernac_cmds: Definition sin_term (a:R) (i:nat) : R := (-1) ^ i * (a ^ (2 * i + 1) / INR (fact (2 * i + 1))).
Definition cos_term (a:R) (i:nat) : R := (-1) ^ i * (a ^ (2 * i) / INR (fact (2 * i))).
Definition sin_approx (a:R) (n:nat) : R := sum_f_R0 (sin_term a) n.
Definition cos_approx (a:R) (n:nat) : R := sum_f_R0 (cos_term a) n.
Theorem pre_sin_bound : forall (a:R) (n:nat), 0 <= a -> a <= 4 -> sin_approx a (2 * n + 1) <= sin a <= sin_approx a (2 * (n + 1)).
rewrite Hyp_a; rewrite sin_0; split; right; unfold sin_approx; apply sum_eq_R0 || (symmetry ; apply sum_eq_R0); intros; unfold sin_term; rewrite pow_add; simpl; unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rmult_0_l; ring.

cut (sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => sin_term a (S i)) (pred (2 * n + 1)) <= sin a - a /\ sin a - a <= sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => sin_term a (S i)) (pred (2 * (n + 1))) -> a + sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => sin_term a (S i)) (pred (2 * n + 1)) <= sin a /\ sin a <= a + sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => sin_term a (S i)) (pred (2 * (n + 1)))).
set (Un := fun n:nat => a ^ (2 * S n + 1) / INR (fact (2 * S n + 1))).
replace (sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => sin_term a (S i)) (2 * n)) with (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n)).
replace (sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => sin_term a (S i)) (S (2 * n))) with (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n))).
cut (sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n)) <= a - sin a <= sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n) -> - sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n) <= sin a - a <= - sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n))).
unfold Un_decreasing, Un; intro; cut ((2 * S (S n0) + 1)%nat = S (S (2 * S n0 + 1))).
replace (a ^ S (S (2 * S n0 + 1))) with (a ^ (2 * S n0 + 1) * (a * a)).
unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rmult_assoc; apply Rmult_le_compat_l.
rewrite <- H3; apply lt_INR_0; apply neq_O_lt; red; intro; assert (H5 := eq_sym H4); elim (fact_neq_0 _ H5).
rewrite <- H3; rewrite (Rmult_comm (INR (fact (2 * S (S n0) + 1)))); rewrite Rmult_assoc; rewrite <- Rinv_l_sym.
rewrite Rmult_1_r; rewrite H3; do 2 rewrite fact_simpl; do 2 rewrite mult_INR; repeat rewrite Rmult_assoc; rewrite <- Rinv_r_sym.

do 2 rewrite S_INR; rewrite plus_INR; rewrite mult_INR; repeat rewrite S_INR; simpl; replace (((0 + 1 + 1) * (INR n0 + 1) + (0 + 1) + 1 + 1) * ((0 + 1 + 1) * (INR n0 + 1) + (0 + 1) + 1)) with (4 * INR n0 * INR n0 + 18 * INR n0 + 20); [ idtac | ring ].
assert (H3 := cv_speed_pow_fact a); unfold Un; unfold Un_cv in H3; unfold R_dist in H3; unfold Un_cv; unfold R_dist; intros; elim (H3 eps H4); intros N H5.
replace (2 * S n0 + 1)%nat with (S (2 * S n0)).
unfold ge; apply le_trans with (2 * S n0)%nat.
apply (fun m n p:nat => mult_le_compat_l p n m); apply le_n_Sn.
apply (fun m n p:nat => mult_le_compat_l p n m); apply le_n_S; assumption.
unfold sin_in, infinite_sum, R_dist in p; unfold Un_cv, R_dist; intros.
replace (sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) n0) with (a * (1 - sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => sin_n i * Rsqr a ^ i) (S n0))).

unfold Rminus; rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_l; rewrite Rmult_1_r; rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; rewrite Ropp_involutive; repeat rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite (Rplus_comm a); rewrite (Rplus_comm (- a)); repeat rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_r; apply Rmult_lt_reg_l with (/ Rabs a).
pattern (/ Rabs a) at 1; rewrite <- (Rabs_Rinv a Hyp_a).

rewrite <- Rabs_mult, Rmult_plus_distr_l, <- 2!Rmult_assoc, <- Rinv_l_sym; [ rewrite Rmult_1_l | assumption ]; rewrite (Rmult_comm (/ Rabs a)), <- Rabs_Ropp, Ropp_plus_distr, Ropp_involutive, Rmult_1_l.
apply H6; unfold ge; apply le_trans with n0; [ exact H5 | apply le_n_Sn ].
rewrite (decomp_sum (fun i:nat => sin_n i * Rsqr a ^ i) (S n0)).

simpl; rewrite Rmult_1_r; unfold Rminus; rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rplus_0_l; rewrite Ropp_mult_distr_r_reverse; rewrite <- Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse; rewrite scal_sum; apply sum_eq.
intros; unfold sin_n, Un, tg_alt; replace ((-1) ^ S i) with (- (-1) ^ i).
replace (a ^ (2 * S i + 1)) with (Rsqr a * Rsqr a ^ i * a).
rewrite pow_add; rewrite pow_Rsqr; simpl; ring.
unfold sin_n; unfold Rdiv; simpl; rewrite Rinv_1; rewrite Rmult_1_r; reflexivity.
replace (sin a - a) with (- (a - sin a)); [ idtac | ring ].
replace (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n))) with (-1 * sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n))); [ rewrite scal_sum | ring ].
apply sum_eq; intros; unfold sin_term, Un, tg_alt; change ((-1) ^ S i) with (-1 * (-1) ^ i).
replace (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n)) with (-1 * sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n)); [ rewrite scal_sum | ring ].
unfold sin_term, Un, tg_alt; change ((-1) ^ S i) with (-1 * (-1) ^ i).
rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; rewrite (Rplus_comm (- a)); apply H2.
rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; rewrite (Rplus_comm (- a)); apply H3.
unfold sin_term; simpl; unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rinv_1; ring.
inversion H; [ assumption | elim Hyp_a; symmetry ; assumption ].
Lemma pre_cos_bound : forall (a:R) (n:nat), - 2 <= a -> a <= 2 -> cos_approx a (2 * n + 1) <= cos a <= cos_approx a (2 * (n + 1)).

cut ((forall (a:R) (n:nat), 0 <= a -> a <= 2 -> cos_approx a (2 * n + 1) <= cos a <= cos_approx a (2 * (n + 1))) -> forall (a:R) (n:nat), - 2 <= a -> a <= 2 -> cos_approx a (2 * n + 1) <= cos a <= cos_approx a (2 * (n + 1))).
intros H a n; apply H.

cut (sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_term a0 (S i)) (pred (2 * n0 + 1)) <= cos a0 - 1 /\ cos a0 - 1 <= sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_term a0 (S i)) (pred (2 * (n0 + 1))) -> 1 + sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_term a0 (S i)) (pred (2 * n0 + 1)) <= cos a0 /\ cos a0 <= 1 + sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_term a0 (S i)) (pred (2 * (n0 + 1)))).
set (Un := fun n:nat => a0 ^ (2 * S n) / INR (fact (2 * S n))).
replace (sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_term a0 (S i)) (2 * n0)) with (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n0)).
replace (sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_term a0 (S i)) (S (2 * n0))) with (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n0))).
cut (sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n0)) <= 1 - cos a0 <= sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n0) -> - sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n0) <= cos a0 - 1 <= - sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n0))).
cut ((2 * S (S n1))%nat = S (S (2 * S n1))).
intro; rewrite H4; replace (a0 ^ S (S (2 * S n1))) with (a0 ^ (2 * S n1) * (a0 * a0)).
unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rmult_assoc; apply Rmult_le_compat_l.
rewrite <- H4; apply lt_INR_0; apply neq_O_lt; red; intro; assert (H6 := eq_sym H5); elim (fact_neq_0 _ H6).
rewrite <- H4; rewrite (Rmult_comm (INR (fact (2 * S (S n1))))); rewrite Rmult_assoc; rewrite <- Rinv_l_sym.
rewrite Rmult_1_r; rewrite H4; do 2 rewrite fact_simpl; do 2 rewrite mult_INR; repeat rewrite Rmult_assoc; rewrite <- Rinv_r_sym.

rewrite Rmult_1_r; do 2 rewrite S_INR; rewrite mult_INR; repeat rewrite S_INR; simpl; replace (((0 + 1 + 1) * (INR n1 + 1) + 1 + 1) * ((0 + 1 + 1) * (INR n1 + 1) + 1)) with (4 * INR n1 * INR n1 + 14 * INR n1 + 12); [ idtac | ring ].
assert (H4 := cv_speed_pow_fact a0); unfold Un; unfold Un_cv in H4; unfold R_dist in H4; unfold Un_cv; unfold R_dist; intros; elim (H4 eps H5); intros N H6; exists N; intros.
apply H6; unfold ge; apply le_trans with (2 * S N)%nat.
apply (fun m n p:nat => mult_le_compat_l p n m); apply le_n_Sn.
apply (fun m n p:nat => mult_le_compat_l p n m); apply le_n_S; assumption.
unfold cos_in, infinite_sum, R_dist in p; unfold Un_cv, R_dist; intros.
replace (sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) n1) with (1 - sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_n i * Rsqr a0 ^ i) (S n1)).

unfold Rminus; rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; rewrite Ropp_involutive; repeat rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite (Rplus_comm 1); rewrite (Rplus_comm (-(1))); repeat rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite <- Rabs_Ropp; rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; rewrite Ropp_involutive; unfold Rminus in H6; apply H6.
unfold ge; apply le_trans with n1.
rewrite (decomp_sum (fun i:nat => cos_n i * Rsqr a0 ^ i) (S n1)).

simpl; rewrite Rmult_1_r; unfold Rminus; rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rplus_0_l; replace (- sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_n (S i) * (Rsqr a0 * Rsqr a0 ^ i)) n1) with (-1 * sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_n (S i) * (Rsqr a0 * Rsqr a0 ^ i)) n1); [ idtac | ring ]; rewrite scal_sum; apply sum_eq; intros; unfold cos_n, Un, tg_alt.
replace (a0 ^ (2 * S i)) with (Rsqr a0 * Rsqr a0 ^ i).
unfold cos_n; unfold Rdiv; simpl; rewrite Rinv_1; rewrite Rmult_1_r; reflexivity.
intros; elim H3; intros; replace (cos a0 - 1) with (- (1 - cos a0)); [ idtac | ring ].
replace (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n0))) with (-1 * sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n0))); [ rewrite scal_sum | ring ].
apply sum_eq; intros; unfold cos_term, Un, tg_alt; change ((-1) ^ S i) with (-1 * (-1) ^ i).

replace (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n0)) with (-1 * sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n0)); [ rewrite scal_sum | ring ]; apply sum_eq; intros; unfold cos_term, Un, tg_alt; change ((-1) ^ S i) with (-1 * (-1) ^ i).
rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; rewrite (Rplus_comm (-1)); apply H3.
rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; rewrite (Rplus_comm (-1)); apply H4.
unfold cos_term; simpl; unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rinv_1; ring.
intro; cut (forall (x:R) (n:nat), cos_approx x n = cos_approx (- x) n).
intro; rewrite H3; rewrite (H3 a (2 * (n + 1))%nat); rewrite cos_sym; apply H.
intros; unfold cos_approx; apply sum_eq; intros; unfold cos_term; do 2 rewrite pow_Rsqr; rewrite Rsqr_neg; unfold Rdiv; reflexivity.

command: rewrite Hyp_a; rewrite sin_0; split; right; unfold sin_approx; apply sum_eq_R0 || (symmetry ; apply sum_eq_R0); intros; unfold sin_term; rewrite pow_add; simpl; unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rmult_0_l; ring.

apply (fun m n p:nat => mult_le_compat_l p n m); apply le_n_S; assumption.
unfold sin_in, infinite_sum, R_dist in p; unfold Un_cv, R_dist; intros.
replace (sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) n0) with (a * (1 - sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => sin_n i * Rsqr a ^ i) (S n0))).

unfold Rminus; rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_l; rewrite Rmult_1_r; rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; rewrite Ropp_involutive; repeat rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite (Rplus_comm a); rewrite (Rplus_comm (- a)); repeat rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_r; apply Rmult_lt_reg_l with (/ Rabs a).

rewrite <- Rabs_mult, Rmult_plus_distr_l, <- 2!Rmult_assoc, <- Rinv_l_sym; [ rewrite Rmult_1_l | assumption ]; rewrite (Rmult_comm (/ Rabs a)), <- Rabs_Ropp, Ropp_plus_distr, Ropp_involutive, Rmult_1_l.
apply H6; unfold ge; apply le_trans with n0; [ exact H5 | apply le_n_Sn ].
rewrite (decomp_sum (fun i:nat => sin_n i * Rsqr a ^ i) (S n0)).

simpl; rewrite Rmult_1_r; unfold Rminus; rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rplus_0_l; rewrite Ropp_mult_distr_r_reverse; rewrite <- Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse; rewrite scal_sum; apply sum_eq.

unfold sin_n; unfold Rdiv; simpl; rewrite Rinv_1; rewrite Rmult_1_r; reflexivity.

replace (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n))) with (-1 * sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n))); [ rewrite scal_sum | ring ].
apply sum_eq; intros; unfold sin_term, Un, tg_alt; change ((-1) ^ S i) with (-1 * (-1) ^ i).
replace (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n)) with (-1 * sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n)); [ rewrite scal_sum | ring ].
unfold sin_term, Un, tg_alt; change ((-1) ^ S i) with (-1 * (-1) ^ i).
rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; rewrite (Rplus_comm (- a)); apply H2.
rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; rewrite (Rplus_comm (- a)); apply H3.
unfold sin_term; simpl; unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rinv_1; ring.

cut ((forall (a:R) (n:nat), 0 <= a -> a <= 2 -> cos_approx a (2 * n + 1) <= cos a <= cos_approx a (2 * (n + 1))) -> forall (a:R) (n:nat), - 2 <= a -> a <= 2 -> cos_approx a (2 * n + 1) <= cos a <= cos_approx a (2 * (n + 1))).
intros H a n; apply H.

cut (sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_term a0 (S i)) (pred (2 * n0 + 1)) <= cos a0 - 1 /\ cos a0 - 1 <= sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_term a0 (S i)) (pred (2 * (n0 + 1))) -> 1 + sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_term a0 (S i)) (pred (2 * n0 + 1)) <= cos a0 /\ cos a0 <= 1 + sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_term a0 (S i)) (pred (2 * (n0 + 1)))).
set (Un := fun n:nat => a0 ^ (2 * S n) / INR (fact (2 * S n))).
replace (sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_term a0 (S i)) (2 * n0)) with (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n0)).
replace (sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_term a0 (S i)) (S (2 * n0))) with (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n0))).
cut (sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n0)) <= 1 - cos a0 <= sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n0) -> - sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n0) <= cos a0 - 1 <= - sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n0))).
cut ((2 * S (S n1))%nat = S (S (2 * S n1))).
intro; rewrite H4; replace (a0 ^ S (S (2 * S n1))) with (a0 ^ (2 * S n1) * (a0 * a0)).
unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rmult_assoc; apply Rmult_le_compat_l.
rewrite <- H4; apply lt_INR_0; apply neq_O_lt; red; intro; assert (H6 := eq_sym H5); elim (fact_neq_0 _ H6).
rewrite <- H4; rewrite (Rmult_comm (INR (fact (2 * S (S n1))))); rewrite Rmult_assoc; rewrite <- Rinv_l_sym.
rewrite Rmult_1_r; rewrite H4; do 2 rewrite fact_simpl; do 2 rewrite mult_INR; repeat rewrite Rmult_assoc; rewrite <- Rinv_r_sym.

rewrite Rmult_1_r; do 2 rewrite S_INR; rewrite mult_INR; repeat rewrite S_INR; simpl; replace (((0 + 1 + 1) * (INR n1 + 1) + 1 + 1) * ((0 + 1 + 1) * (INR n1 + 1) + 1)) with (4 * INR n1 * INR n1 + 14 * INR n1 + 12); [ idtac | ring ].

apply (fun m n p:nat => mult_le_compat_l p n m); apply le_n_Sn.
apply (fun m n p:nat => mult_le_compat_l p n m); apply le_n_S; assumption.
unfold cos_in, infinite_sum, R_dist in p; unfold Un_cv, R_dist; intros.
replace (sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) n1) with (1 - sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_n i * Rsqr a0 ^ i) (S n1)).

unfold Rminus; rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; rewrite Ropp_involutive; repeat rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite (Rplus_comm 1); rewrite (Rplus_comm (-(1))); repeat rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite <- Rabs_Ropp; rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; rewrite Ropp_involutive; unfold Rminus in H6; apply H6.
unfold ge; apply le_trans with n1.
rewrite (decomp_sum (fun i:nat => cos_n i * Rsqr a0 ^ i) (S n1)).

simpl; rewrite Rmult_1_r; unfold Rminus; rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rplus_0_l; replace (- sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_n (S i) * (Rsqr a0 * Rsqr a0 ^ i)) n1) with (-1 * sum_f_R0 (fun i:nat => cos_n (S i) * (Rsqr a0 * Rsqr a0 ^ i)) n1); [ idtac | ring ]; rewrite scal_sum; apply sum_eq; intros; unfold cos_n, Un, tg_alt.
replace (a0 ^ (2 * S i)) with (Rsqr a0 * Rsqr a0 ^ i).
unfold cos_n; unfold Rdiv; simpl; rewrite Rinv_1; rewrite Rmult_1_r; reflexivity.
intros; elim H3; intros; replace (cos a0 - 1) with (- (1 - cos a0)); [ idtac | ring ].
replace (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n0))) with (-1 * sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (S (2 * n0))); [ rewrite scal_sum | ring ].
apply sum_eq; intros; unfold cos_term, Un, tg_alt; change ((-1) ^ S i) with (-1 * (-1) ^ i).

replace (- sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n0)) with (-1 * sum_f_R0 (tg_alt Un) (2 * n0)); [ rewrite scal_sum | ring ]; apply sum_eq; intros; unfold cos_term, Un, tg_alt; change ((-1) ^ S i) with (-1 * (-1) ^ i).
rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; rewrite (Rplus_comm (-1)); apply H3.
rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; rewrite (Rplus_comm (-1)); apply H4.
unfold cos_term; simpl; unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rinv_1; ring.
intro; cut (forall (x:R) (n:nat), cos_approx x n = cos_approx (- x) n).
intro; rewrite H3; rewrite (H3 a (2 * (n + 1))%nat); rewrite cos_sym; apply H.
intros; unfold cos_approx; apply sum_eq; intros; unfold cos_term; do 2 rewrite pow_Rsqr; rewrite Rsqr_neg; unfold Rdiv; reflexivity.
